title: Vaskiy
author: Vaskiy
content: Happy Easter Wishes to every bitcoiner. May this day bring love, peace and joy to you and your family.Maybe this day be a new start to the life. May the God you bless everyone today and always.On this day of Easter as a connect to bitcoin let us know about four coins that were mentioned in BibleWe can see this on the New Testament : Phoenician shekelHalf-shekelJewish Hasmonean leptonRoman denarius

comments.author: digaran
comments.body: I would remove centralized garbage coins such as ETH, Ripple etc from the basket, because we don't want our precious gold and silver coins to touch garbage.üòâ

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Happy Easter to you mate and may the Almighty God also bless you and grant you and your family a happy and wonderful Easter through Christ resurrection, Amen.Also in connection with Bitcoin, I think I agree with diagran as I don't think it is fair seeing our precious gold with centralized Garbage coin like Ethereum üòÇ it looks really disrespectful.Happy Easter Sunday Bitcointalkers‚ô•Ô∏èüòçü•∞

comments.author: zaki12
comments.body: Happy Easter 2023 to all big Christian families in this forum. Let us all always give thanks to the Lord Jesus for His infinite love in the atonement of sins so as to bring victory and a life full of hope by God's love and blessings.May your Easter basket be filled with peace, love, joy and happiness with the Bullish this year.¬† ¬†Happy Easter Bitcointalk

comments.author: CryptSafe
comments.body: Happy Easter to you too. Wishing the bitcoin community, peace, love and all they could think of to achieve their heart desires. Let love lead as we celebrate the ressurrection of our Lord Jesus Christ. Show love to everyone you come in contact with irrespective of their faith and believe as that is the reason for our existence here on Earth. Be your brothers keep and do stay and live happily.Once again Happy Easter.
